create.description: Can't you find what you were looking for? Register your community!

community.name: Community name
community.no_selected_tip: Please, select a community in the app menu

copy.explore: Explore what people are doing in your community
copy.propose: Propose your project, find support and collaborators
copy.work: Work in your project and expose your needs

login.name: Nickname
login.error: Please, choose a nickname composed by letters, numbers and dots
login.welcome_msg: The tool to promote your proposals in your communities

should_be_logged.message: Sorry! You should be logged in to do that action.

new.notification: {{user}} has created the need "{{need}}" in the workspace

pad.placeholder: Start writting your project description in this collaborative document pad, so other participants know about your project and join it
pad.android5Alert: Oops!, collaborative writting does not works in Android 5. Any edition you make to the pad will be lost. Fixing this is one of our priorities, try again in some days.

create.tip: Please, start creating a new workspace.

info.public: This workspace is visible in the community's workspace list
info.link: Only people with the link can see the workspace

reminder.body_one: This workspace doesn't have a name yet!
reminder.body_two: Do you really want to discard the workspace?

session.title: Tell us a little bit about you
session.intro:
Thanks for testing our prototype!
Please, fill the info bellow to help us understand a little bit more about the way you will use our application.
session.community: In which community do you participate?
session.role: What is your relation with the community?
session.role_90_radio: I am interested in what the community does
session.role_9_radio: I collaborate ocasionally with the community
session.role_1_radio: I am very involved in the community
session.tech: How is your experience with computer programs and moblie applications?

connection.sync: Your changes from {{time.toLocaleString()}} have not been saved.
connection.tip: If the problem persist, copy somewhere else your last changes and reload the application
